sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_bbs_category ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(64) not null, userid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, lasttopicid char(32), lastpostid char(32), topics int4 not null, posts int4 not null, iconclass varchar(32), description varchar(256), oorder int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(name), unique(parentid, text), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_bbs_topic ( id char(32) not null, categoryid char(32) not null, status int2 not null, bbstype int2 not null, askstatus int2 not null, topic varchar(128) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, posts int4 not null, recommendation int4 not null, recommendationdate timestamp, recommendationduration int4 not null, best bool not null, contentmark int4 not null, lastpostdate timestamp not null, lastuserid char(32), favorites int4 not null, views int4 not null, description varchar(256), content text not null, oorder int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_bbs_post ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), contentid char(32) not null, replyid char(32), replies int4 not null, votes int4 not null, bestanswer bool not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, comment text not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_bbs_team ( id char(32) not null, ownerid char(32) not null, role varchar(32), createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id), unique(ownerid, userid, role) );
create table sf_bbs_user ( id char(32) not null, topics int4 not null, posts int4 not null, lasttopicid char(32), lastpostid char(32), primary key(id) );

create table sf_bbs_ask_vote ( id char(32) not null, postid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id), unique(postid, userid) );
